constituent: soup, water, water droplets, water pistol, ten, needle
heisigStory: To make soup, one begins with water and then starts adding things to it, often leftovers from the icebox. This is how the thick soup or stew called "seven-in-one" is made. This kanji does it three better, giving us a ten-ingredient soup.
koohiiStory1: To make soup you just take water and add (+) the rest of your ingredients.
koohiiStory2: To make soup you just take water and add ten tasty ingredients.
words: 汁(しる): juice, sap, soup, broth
